amendment.description: An amendment to reduce the Dept. of Justice salaries and expenses account by $2.5 million and increase funding for the Office of Justice programs by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: Amendment increases funding for Veterans Treatment Courts by $2.5 million. As modified, the third amendment instruction was corrected from line 12 to line 7 to depict the proper line number in the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brownley (CA) amendment (A023) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Brownley (CA) amendment (A023) modified by unanimous consent. Mr. Fattah made technical changes to the amendment.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A023) offered by Ms. Brownley (CA).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Brownley (CA) amendment (A023) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
